item.description:
Please welcome the third installment of our new event series, the Cocktail Classroom. These fun and informal classes are designed to demystify the art of making delicious drinks. This class will explore Mexico’s beloved tequilas and mezcals. Join Barcelona New Haven’s lead bartenders as they lead an informative Tequila 101 lesson, as well as demonstrate some fantastic tequila and mezcal based cocktails. Executive Chef Mike Hazen will be preparing some Mexico-inspired cocktail friendly bites to curb the appetites while we get our margaritas on! "JUST $30.00 A PERSON "DID ANYONE SAY T-E-Q-U-I-L-A

 "YUM"

group.name: New Haven Wine and Dining Meetup Group,

item.name: "Cocktail Classroom" Tequilas & Mezcals at Barcelona
